# Workpiece Deflection

> **Skill ID:** `prism-physics-workpiece-deflection`
> **Category:** PHYSICS
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Thin wall and slender part deflection

## Capabilities

- Calculate workpiece deflection

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in workpiece deflection.

### When to Use

- When working with physics
- When needing workpiece deflection capabilities

- `prism-tool-geometry`

## Hooks
